listitem.para: Removes (deletes) a directory named directoryname. The directoryname input must be a word (a name of an existing directory). You cannot remove a directory if it is your working directory. You cannot remove a directory that contains files or other directories (both FILES and DIRECTORIES must output the empty list when it is your working directory).

listitem.programlisting:
MKDIR "junk Now in newly created directory "junk"
POPDIR Changed to "C:\Program Files\&PRODUCTNAME;"
RMDIR "junk Removed directory "junk"
